comments.author: jruderman@gmail.com
comments.text:
Steps:
  mkdir d
  firefox -profile d

Result: "Profile Missing. Your Firefox profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible."

Expected: Run with "d" as a profile directory. (Worked in Firefox 3.6.)
comments.raw_text:

  firefox -profile d

Result: "Profile Missing. Your Firefox profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible."

comments.raw_text: I fixed the absolute-path case in bug 581182; not sure if I missed something for the relative-dir case.
